option.name: responseDescription
option.value:
To add an icon to your application, you can modify the XAML code by adding the `Icon` property to the `Window` element. Here's an example of how you can add an icon to your application:
```axaml <Window xmlns="https://github.com/avaloniaui" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" mc:Ignorable="d" d:DesignWidth="800" d:DesignHeight="450" x:Class="Bulkaa.Table" Title="MainForm" Icon="/YourApplicationName;component/YourIconFile.ico"> ```
Replace `YourApplicationName` with the name of your application and `YourIconFile.ico` with the file name of your icon file. Make sure to place the icon file in the appropriate location within your project.
By adding the `Icon` property, your application will now have an icon associated with it.

option.name: responseDescription
option.value:
To change the color of the form to green and white, you can modify the XAML code by adding a background color to the Grid element. Here's the updated code:
```axaml <Window xmlns="https://github.com/avaloniaui" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" mc:Ignorable="d" d:DesignWidth="800" d:DesignHeight="450" x:Class="Bulkaa.AddEd" Title="AddEd"> <Grid Background="Green"> <UniformGrid Columns="1" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center"> <TextBlock Margin = "90 10 0 0" FontSize = "20" FontWeight="Bold"> Регистрация</TextBlock> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Margin = "0 25 0 0">Код: </TextBlock> <TextBox Name="id" x:CompileBindings="False" Text="{Binding ID}" Width="200" Height="5" Margin = "10 0 0 0" Watermark="Индивидуальный номер"></TextBox> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Margin = "0 25 0 0">Код клиента: </TextBlock> <TextBox Name="cl_id" x:CompileBindings="False" Text="{Binding client_id}" Width="200" Height="5" Margin = "55 0 0 0" Watermark="код клиентв"></TextBox> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Margin = "0 25 0 0">Код авто: </TextBlock> <TextBox Name="av_id" x:CompileBindings="False" Text="{Binding avto_id}" Width="200" Height="5" Margin = "90 0 0 0" Watermark="Код авто"></TextBox> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Margin = "0 25 0 0">Адрес куда: </TextBlock> <TextBox Name="ad_f" x:CompileBindings="False" Text="{Binding adres_from}" Width="200" Height="5" Margin = "75 0 0 0" Watermark="Адрес откуда"></TextBox> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Margin = "0 25 0 0">Адрес откуда: </TextBlock> <TextBox Name="ad_t" x:CompileBindings="False" Text="{Binding adres_to}" Width="200" Height="5" Margin = "75 0 0 0" Watermark="Адрес куда"></TextBox> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Margin = "0 25 0 0">Дата: </TextBlock> <TextBox Name="date" x:CompileBindings="False" Text="{Binding date}" Width="200" Height="5" Margin = "75 0 0 0" Watermark="Дата"></TextBox> </StackPanel> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <TextBlock Margin = "0 25 0 0">Цена: </TextBlock> <TextBox Name="price" x:CompileBindings="False" Text="{Binding price}" Width="200" Height="5" Margin = "75 0 0 0" Watermark="Цена"></TextBox> </StackPanel>
<StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal"> <Button Name="Save" Content="Сохранить" Click="Save_OnClick" Margin = "0 15 0 20"></Button> <Button Name="Back" Content="Назад" Click="GoBack" Margin = "165 15 0 20"></Button> </StackPanel> </UniformGrid> </Grid> </Window> ```
Now, the form will have a green background color.

option.name: responseDescription
option.value: Hello, I am Machinet AI - context aware chat, which can help you with your daily programming routine. How can I help?
